features.title: üéß Features & Audio
features.q1: How does the sleep timer work?
features.a1: Set a timer (15-120 minutes), and the audio will gently fade out over 3 seconds when the timer ends. Perfect for falling asleep without sudden interruptions.
features.a2: Yes! SoundFlows is a Progressive Web App (PWA). Once you've played sounds, they're cached for offline playback. Works great on flights or in areas with poor connectivity.
features.a3: We currently offer 213+ high-quality audio files across 9 categories: Rain, Water, Animal Sounds, Hypnosis, Meditation, Fire, Singing Bowls, Chakra, and Subconscious Therapy.
